content: 1 icecream softie crochet pattern by vl creations thank you for choosing this pattern i hope you have fun making this cute icecream softie the softie is about 20cm tall the size of a real icecream if you make him with plush yarn and an 8mm hook like all my patterns you can size up or down by changing the yarn and the hook size if you like this pattern please leave a review and share your creations on my ravelry page sivvus or swing by my blog https //vlcreations4 wordpress com/ difficulty level easy us terms you will need 8mm hook 2 yarn choose yarn of the weight you like in icecream colours e g brown for the cone pink mint or yellow for the icecream brighter yarn for sprinkles safety eyes stuffing techniques used in this pattern magic_ring make a slip knot and work the first row into the ring pull the end thread of the knot tight to close the circle invisible decrease insert the hook into the front loops of the next two stitches yarn over and through complete the stitch like a normal single_crochet stitches single_crochet single_crochet increase increase two single_crochet stitches in one stitch decrease decrease see invisible decrease tutorial normal decrease stitches can be used if preferred notes this pattern is worked in a spiral with one round moving continuously into the next without turning if you would prefer to work in row ch1 and turn at the start
